Get subclasses of a Wikidata class

Source: R/explore_classes.R
subclasses_of.Rd

Get subclasses of a Wikidata class

Usage

subclasses_of(id, include_self = FALSE)

Arguments

id

the id of class

include_self

whether to include class itself in the results table

Examples

subclasses_of("wd:Q7930989")
#> # A tibble: 37 × 4
#>    from        to          classes     classesLabel                             
#>    <chr>       <chr>       <chr>       <chr>                                    
#>  1 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q515     wd:Q515     city                                     
#>  2 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q3957    wd:Q3957    town                                     
#>  3 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q123601  wd:Q123601  cities and towns in Lebanon              
#>  4 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q159438  wd:Q159438  Hero City of the Soviet Union            
#>  5 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q174844  wd:Q174844  megacity                                 
#>  6 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q692581  wd:Q692581  holy city                                
#>  7 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q853252  wd:Q853252  mining town                              
#>  8 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q896881  wd:Q896881  city with tens of thousands of inhabitan…
#>  9 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q902814  wd:Q902814  border town                              
#> 10 wd:Q7930989 wd:Q1392581 wd:Q1392581 cycling city                             
#> # … with 27 more rows
